text: Lynne Marie Stewart (December 14, 1946 â€“ February 21, 2025) was an American actress. She was known for her role as Miss Yvonne, in The Pee-wee Herman Show, the CBS television show Pee-wee's Playhouse, the 2010 Los Angeles stage revival, and the Broadway production. Stewart was also known for her role on the FX/FXX television series It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia as Charlie Kelly's mother Bonnie. Stewart died in Los Angeles, California on February 21, 2025 from liver and gallbladder cancer at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:Deaths from gallbladder cancer Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Lynne Marie Stewart
